name: Up a Creek (Calvin Josenhans)
description:
This game is about a boat racing out of control down a river, and your only means of moving are pushing off the sides of the banks.

I would have liked to have added more levels and animations, and maybe a score counter, coins, etc, but making the framework took me too long. I'm still super happy with it for only having two days.

The music acts up on the browser version, but the game is still playable.
